and.attribute: 130 Suong Nguyet Anh, Dist 1, Ho Chi Minh city

- Supervise System & Network management & maintenance (Server, Email, LAN…) - Supervise and support to install, configure hardware, software (Server, PC, LAN) - Improve IT related procedure both programming and administration following Head Office policy. - Install system requested by Head Office - Develop system programs based on the request and share the information by making proper documentation - Make timely report to Management & Head office - Supervise and educate other IT staff - Provide general IT supports to other staff - Other duties assigned by Management

- From 35-45 years old - University Graduate in Informatics Technology - Good command in English - At least 4 years of experience as a Systems & Network Engineer, or Network Operations Field Engineer. - Deep knowledge of server and networking environments including Microsoft Servers, Lotus Domino, VMware, Cisco products, Firewall and Security, solid knowledge in LAN and WAN. - Experience in troubleshooting router, DNS, DHCP, SMTP, Lotus Notes, PC, LAN, Printers, Telephone systems. - Understand programming skill - Having IT experience in banking is preferable - Having accounting knowledge is preferable - Leader skill is a must - Hard working & willing to work overtime if required - Mentally and physically tough Interested candidates are requested click on "APPLY" ("NỘP ĐƠN") button to send application with photo and CV in English to us before 18 Aug 2014. Please do not contact via phone. Thank you!
